name: Football Game
description: You are Tommy, a local high school football hero in the town of East Bend. It’s game night for the Purchase County Turbines and your sweetheart is waiting in the bleachers. Join Tommy for a night you won’t forget...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel or AMD CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
